Verses: 1 dhesaththile Panjam Kodidhaayirundhadhu.
2 egipthilirundhu Avargal Konduvandha Dhaaniyam Selavazhindhapodhu, Avargal Thagappan Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Thirumbap Poi, Namakkuk Konjam Dhaaniyam Vaangikkondu Vaarungal Endraan.
3 adharku Yoodhaa: Ungal Sagodharan Ungalodekooda Varaavittaal, Neengal En Mugaththaik Kaanbadhillai Endru Andha Manidhan Engalukkuch Saththiyamaaich Sonnaan.
4 engal Sagodharanai Neer Engalodekooda Anuppinaal, Naangal Poi, Umakkuth Dhaaniyam Vaangikkondu Varuvom.
5 anuppaavittaal. Naangal Pogamaattom; Ungal Sagodharan Ungalodekooda Varaavittaal, Neengal En Mugaththaik Kaanbadhillai Endru Andha Manidhan Engalode Solliyirukkiraan Endraan.
6 adharku Isravel: Ungalukku Innum Oru Sagodharan Undendru Neengal Andha Manidhanukkuch Solli, En Enakku Indhath Thunbaththai Varuviththeergal Endraan.

7 tharku Avargal: Andha Manidhan, Ungal Thagappan Innum Uyirodirukkiraaraa? Ungalukku Innum Oru Sagodharan Undaa? Endru Engalaiyum Engal Vamsaththaiyum Kuriththu Vivaramaai Visaariththaan; Andhak Kelvigalukkuth Thagundhaaga Ullabadi Avanukkuch Sonnom; Ungal Sagodharanai Ungalodekooda Inge Konduvaarungal Endru Avan Solluvaan Enbadhai Naangal Arindhirundhomaa Endraargal.
8 pinnum, Yoodhaa Than Thagappanaagiya Isravelai Nokki: Neerum Naangalum Engal Kuzhandhaigalum Saagaamal Uyirodirukkumbadi, Naangal Purappattuppogirom, Pillaiyaandaanai Ennode Anuppum.
9 avanukkaaga Naan Uththaravaadhampannuven; Avanai Ennidaththile Kelum, Naan Avanai Ummidaththil Konduvandhu, Umakku Munbaaga Niruththaamalponaal, Ennaalum Andhak Kutram Enmel Iruppadhaaga.
10 naangal Thaamadhiyaadhirundhomaanaal, Idharkulle Irandaandharam Poith Thirumbi Vandhiruppome Endraan.

11 adharku Avargal Thagappanaagiya Isravel: Appadiyaanaal, Ondru Seyyungal; Indha Dhesaththin Uchchidhamaana Vasthukkalil Konjam Pisin Thailamum, Konjam Thenum, Kandhavarkkangalum, Vellaippolamum, Therapindhu Kottaigalum, Vaadhumaikkottaigalum Ungal Saakkugalil Pottu, Andha Manidhanukkuk Kaanikkaiyaagak Kondupoik Kodungal.
12 panaththai Irattippaai Ungal Kaikalil Kondupongal, Saakkugalin Vaayile Thirumbak Konduvandha Panaththaiyum Kondupongal; Adhu Kaippisakaai Vandhirukkum.
13 ungal Sagodharanaiyum Koottikkondu, Andha Manidhanidaththukku Marubadiyum Pongal.

14 andha Manidhan, Angirukkira Ungal Matra Sagodharanaiyum Benyameenaiyum Ungaludane Anuppividumbadikku, Sarvavallamaiyulla Dhevan Avan Samugaththil Ungalukku Irakkamkidaikkappannuvaaraaga; Naano Pillaiyatrup Ponavanaippol Iruppen Endraan.

15 appozhudhu Avargal Kaanikkaiyaiyum Thangal Kaigalil Irattippaana Panaththaiyum Eduththukkondu, Benyameenaiyum Koottikkondu, Pirayaanappattu, Egipthukkuppoi, Yoseppin Samugaththil Vandhu Nindraargal.

16 benyameen Avarkalodekooda Vandhirukkiradhai Yoseppu Kandu, Than Veettu Visaaranaikkaaranai Nokki: Nee Indha Manidharai Veettukku Azhaiththuppoi, Saappaattukku Vendiyavaigalai Adiththu, Aayaththampannu, Maththiyaanaththile Indha Manidhar Ennode Saappiduvaargal Endraan.
17 avan Thanakku Yoseppu Sonnabadiye Seydhu, Andha Manidharai Yoseppin Veettukku Azhaiththukkondu Ponaan.

18 thaangal Yoseppin Veettukkuk Kondupogappadugiradhai Avargal Kandu Bayandhu, Munne Nammudaiya Saakkugalil Irundha Panaththinimiththam Nammel Kutram Sumaththi, Nammaip Pidiththuch Siraigalaakki, Nammudaiya Kazhudhaigalai Eduththukkollumbati Nammaikkondupogiraargal Endru Solli,
19 yoseppin Veettu Visaaranaikkaaranandaiyile Serndhu, Veettu Vaasalpadiyile Avanode Pesi:
20 aandavane, Naangal Dhaaniyam Kollumbadi Munne Vandhuponome;

21 naangal Thangum Idaththil Poi Engal Saakkugalaith Thirandhapodhu, Naangal Niruththukkoduththa Niraiyinbadiye Avanavan Panam Avanavan Saakkin Vaayile Irukkak Kandom; Adhai Naangal Thirumbavum Engal Kaiyile Konduvandhirukkirom.
22 melum, Dhaaniyam Kollumbati Vere Panamum Engal Kaiyil Kondu Vandhirukkirom; Naangal Mun Koduththa Panaththai Engal Saakkugalil Pottadhu Innaar Endru Ariyom Endraargal.

23 adharku Avan: Ungalukkuch Samaadhaanam; Bayappadavendaam; Ungal Dhevanum Ungal Thagappanudaiya Dhevanumaayirukkiravar Ungal Saakkugalil Adhai Ungalukkup Pudhaiyalaagak Kattalaiyittaar; Neengal Koduththa Panam Ennidaththil Vandhu Serndhadhu Endru Solli, Simiyonai Veliye Azhaiththu Vandhu, Avargalidaththil Vittaan.
24 melum, Andha Manidhan Avargalai Yoseppin Veettukkulle Koottikkondupoi, Avargal Thangal Kaalgalaik Kazhuvumbati Thanneer Koduththu, Avargaludaiya Kazhudhaigalukkuth Theevanam Pottaan.
25 thaangal Ange Bojanam Seyyappogiradhai Avargal Kelvippattabadiyaal, Madhthiyaanaththil Yoseppu Varumalavum Kaanikkaiyai Aayaththamaai Vaiththuk Kaaththukkondirundhaargal.
26 yoseppu Veettukku Vandhapodhu, Avargal Thangal Kaiyil Irundha Kaanikkaiyai Veettukkul Avanidaththil Kondupoi Vaiththu, Tharaimattum Kunindhu, Avanai Vananginaargal.
27 appozhudhu Avan: Avargal Sugaseydhiyai Visaariththu, Neengal Sonna Mudhirvayadhaana Ungal Thagappan Sugamaayirukkiraaraa? Avar Innum Uyirodirukkiraaraa? Endru Avargalidaththil Visaariththaan.
28 adharku Avargal: Engal Thagappanaaraagiya Umadhu Adiyaan Sugamaayirukkiraar, Innum Uyirodirukkiraar Endru Solli, Kunindhu Vananginaargal.

29 avan Than Kangalai Ereduththu, Than Thaai Petra Kumaaranaagiya Than Sagodharan Benyameenaik Kandu, Neengal Enakkuch Sonna Ungal Ilaiya Sagodharan Ivandhaanaa Endru Kettu, Magane, Dhevan Unakkuk Kirubaiseyyakkadavar Endraan.
30 yoseppin Ullam Than Sagodharanukkaagap Ponginabadiyaal, Avan Azhugiradharku Idam Thedi, Thuridhamaai Araikkulle Poi, Ange Azhudhaan.
31 pinbu, Avan Than Mugaththaik Kazhuvi Veliye Vandhu, Thannai Adakkikkondu, Bojanam Vaiyungal Endraan.

32 egipthiyar Ebireyarode Saappidamaattaargal; Appadich Seyvadhu Egipthiyarukku Aruvaruppaayirukkum; Aagaiyaal, Avanukkuth Thanippadavum, Avargalukkuth Thanippadavum, Avanode Saappitugira Egipthiyarukkuth Thanippadavum Vaiththaargal.
33 avanukku Munbaaga, Mooththavan Mudhal Ilaiyavanvaraikkum Avanavan Vayadhinbadiye Avargalai Utkaaravaiththaargal; Adharkaaga Avargal, Oruvarai Oruvar Paarththu Aachchariyappattaargal.

34 avan Thanakkumun Vaikkappattirundha Bojanaththil Avargalukkup Pangittu Anuppinaan; Avargal Ellaarudaiya Pangugalaippaarkkilum Benyameenudaiya Pangu Aindhumadangu Adhigamaayirundhadhu; Avargal Baanampanni, Avanudane Sandhoshamaayirundhaargal.
